channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No fly zone: Airports ground Kristi Noem's government shutdown video

item.description: As President Trump basks in his success in the Middle East, hairline fractures within his Republican base are cropping up on a smattering of domestic ...

item.title: AI will fuel populism and power shifts, JPMorgan Chase says
item.description: A new report from JPMorgan Chase warns that AI will shake up global alliances, stoke fresh populism and change the rules of war in the century ahead. ...

item.title: Trump's immigration crackdown sparks fear and alarm at hospitals
item.description: The Trump administration's rollback of a policy that prohibited immigration enforcement in hospitals is sparking fear and confusion in exam rooms and ...

item.title: Janet Mills injects Trump into her Maine Senate campaign
item.description: Maine Gov. Janet Mills announced Tuesday she is launching her long-expected Senate campaign, giving Democratic leaders a major recruiting victory and ...

item.title: Is this top Senate recruit too old to run? Some Democrats think so.
item.description: Maine Gov. Janet Mills, 77, would be the oldest freshman senator ever. Her Tuesday campaign launch has prompted some criticism and reignited a debate ...

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene, tearing into her own party, says GOP men in Congress are ‘weak’
item.description: “There’s a lot of weak Republican men and they’re more afraid of strong Republican women,” Greene said.

item.title: Trump complains about ‘really weird’ Time magazine photo

item.title: Who will lose out when ACA health insurance subsidies expire?
item.description: Here’s a look at who could be affected by the end of the Affordable Care Act credits and how much prices could change.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
